July 21, 1934 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class B)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class B) 510 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-b

A Souvenir of Shakespeare
Peniel Farm, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Hymn ('Denton Park' - Handel Parker): 1 Kitsilano Boys 2 Newquay Town 3 Redruth Town 4 St. Just Silver 5= Indian Queens Silver 5= St. Pinnock 7 Foxhole Silver
Class B Championship of Cornwall (highest placed Cornish band): Newquay Town
Best Player: C. Bragg, G Trombone, Foxhole Silver Best Cornet: W. Bailey, St. Blazey Best Euphonium: F. Niles, Newquay
The deportment award (known as "Class D"), which was awarded over bands from all sections, was given to Kitsilano Boys.
May 8, 2011, 8:29 p.m. Aug. 7, 2013, 1:54 p.m.
